results.title: Abridge Earns Rankings in KLAS Emerging Solutions Report
results.content: # Abridge Becomes First-Ever Generative AI Company to Earn Triple Top Five Ranking in KLAS Emerging Solutions Report Including No. 1 for Clinician Experience *Abridge ranked No. 1 in “Improve Clinician Experience,” No. 3 in “Improve Patient Experience,” and No. 4 in “Improve Outcomes” in the 2024 KLAS Emerging Solutions Report*‍ PITTSBURGH, PA and SAN FRANCISCO, CA—October 21, 2024—Today, Abridge became the first generative AI company to be ranked across three of four categories in the KLAS Emerging Solutions Top 20 Report, which highlights exceptional technology partners based on insights from 49 healthcare-technology thought leaders and executives across the country. Abridge ranked third for improving patient experience with a 41% increase in clinicians giving undivided attention while providing AI-generated Patient Visit Summaries that give patients a tailored visit summary written at an 8th grade reading level.

results.title: Abridge Raises $300M Series E at $5.3B Valuation
results.content: # Abridge Raises $300M Series E at $5.3B Valuation Abridge, a Pittsburgh, PA-based AI-powered healthcare company, has secured $300 million in Series E funding at a $5.3 billion valuation. The round was led by Andreessen Horowitz, with participation from Khosla Ventures. Andreessen Horowitz is a venture capital firm focused on investing in and supporting technology-driven companies. **Abridge Use of Funds** The company will use the funds to support its expansion into AI-powered medical coding, in addition to scaling its core medical scribe technology. **About Abridge** Abridge is uses generative AI to automate clinical documentation. Abridge's mission is to power deeper understanding in healthcare through purpose-built AI. Company: Abridge AI, Inc. Additional Investors: Khosla Ventures  Source: https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/24/in-just-4-months-ai-medical-scribe-abridge-doubles-valuation-to-5-3b/

results.content:
Overview:
Abridge was founded in 2018 with the mission of powering deeper understanding in healthcare. Our Best in KLAS AI-powered platform was purpose-built for medical conversations, improving clinical documentation efficiencies while enabling clinicians to focus on what matters most—their patients. Our enterprise-grade technology transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes in real-time, with deep EMR integrations. Powered by Linked Evidence and our purpose-built, auditable AI, we are the only company that maps AI-generated summaries to ground truth, helping providers quickly trust and verify the output. As pioneers in generative AI for healthcare, we are setting the industry standards for the responsible deployment of AI across health systems.
